c6-s3.ipa: ɖǐn ʨiáː pịàŋ ʨɨ̀ː liet jiáː .
c6-s3.tupa: drinh tjiaeq pyaeng tjy liet jiaeq

c6-s6.ipa: těw ʨiáː ʣièn ʨɨ̀ː liet jiáː .
c6-s6.tupa: tewh tjiaeq dzien tjy liet jiaeq

c6-s9.ipa: kʰʉok ʨiáː ʔị̀m ʨɨ̀ː liet jiáː .
c6-s9.tupa: khuok tjiaeq qyim tjy liet jiaeq

c6-s12.ipa: mʉ̀n ʨɨɑ̀ŋ ʨiáː ʣɨ̌ː ʨɨ̀ː liet jiáː .
c6-s12.tupa: mun tjyang tjiaeq dzyh tjy liet jiaeq

c6-s13.ipa: tʰèn ɦạ́ː ʨɨ̀ː mʉt kɨ̌j ʨʉǔŋ .
c6-s13.tupa: then ghaeq tjy mut kyjh tjungh

c6-s16.ipa: kẹ̀j jɨ́ː liet pʉop pʉop ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s16.tupa: keej jyq liet puop puop tjy

c6-s21.ipa: mʉɑ́ŋ pʉùː ʣə̌j mʉt ɲɨ̀ː kʰị̌ː .
c6-s21.tupa: muangq pu dzeojh mut njy khyih

c6-s25.ipa: jʷìː pèn ɖiàŋ jʉǒŋ liet ʨɨ̀ː pʉop .
c6-s25.tupa: jwi pen driaeng juongh liet tjy puop

c6-s38.ipa: ʔit ʔit tʰèm ʔɨə̀ː gɨ̀ː ɦúː jiáː .
c6-s38.tupa: qit qit them qyo gy ghouq jiaeq

c6-s44.ipa: kạp ʨɨ̀ː liet nə́j ɦʉúː ɲǐː ʂʉǒː .
c6-s44.tupa: kaep tjy liet neojq uq njih sruoh

c6-s48.ipa: jʉok ʔit kɨə́ː ɲɨ̀ː ʨʰʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s48.tupa: juok qit kyoq njy tjhung tjy

c6-s58.ipa: kǒː ʥiéː kạp ɦʉúː ɲǐː ʂʉǒː .
c6-s58.tupa: koh djieq kaep uq njih sruoh

c6-s60.ipa: kị̀m jʉok lièn ɦəp kạp ʔịt .
c6-s60.tupa: kyim juok lien gheop kaep qyit

c6-s61.ipa: liàŋ kạp ʨɨ̀ː ɦúː ɦỵèː ʔịt .
c6-s61.tupa: liaeng kaep tjy ghouq ue qyit

c6-s63.ipa: piáŋ lɨɑ́ŋ liet ʥiàŋ ʔit liet .
c6-s63.tupa: piaengq lyangq liet djiaeng qit liet

c6-s67.ipa: ɦʷɑ̀ŋ lòn liet ʨɨ̀ː ɲɨɑk kɑ̀n .
c6-s67.tupa: ghwang lon liet tjy njyak kan

c6-s68.ipa: jiak kʰɑ́ː ʔit kɨə́ː ɲɨ̀ː ɦạ̀m ʨɨ̀ː ɲɨə̀ː ʥiéː .
c6-s68.tupa: jiaek khaq qit kyoq njy ghaem tjy njyo djieq

c6-s75.ipa: kị̀m ʦʰʉóː gɨ̀ː liet ʨɨ̀ː ɕʉúː mʉt .
c6-s75.tupa: kyim tshuoq gy liet tjy sjuq mut

c6-s84.ipa: kạ̀ː gɨ̀ː jɨ́ː sǐː ʥip ŋóː .
c6-s84.tupa: kae gy jyq sih djip ngoq

c6-s86.ipa: jʉok jiak liet ʈʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː mʉt .
c6-s86.tupa: juok jiaek liet trung tjy mut

c6-s87.ipa: nə́j ʂạ̌w pịěn ʣèn ʨɨɑ̀ŋ siak ʨɨ̀ː kʉǒː .
c6-s87.tupa: neojq sraewh pyenh dzen tjyang siaek tjy kuoh

c6-s89.ipa: siak ʨɨ̀ː kạp ʨɨ̀ː ʔit ʨiáː .
c6-s89.tupa: siaek tjy kaep tjy qit tjiaeq

c6-s91.ipa: siak ʨɨ̀ː ʔịt ʨɨ̀ː sɑ̀m ʨiáː .
c6-s91.tupa: siaek tjy qyit tjy sam tjiaeq

c6-s92.ipa: kị̀m pịáŋ ʨɨ̀ː sǐː ʥiéː ɦɨ́ː .
c6-s92.tupa: kyim pyaengq tjy sih djieq yq

c6-s93.ipa: liet ʨɨ̀ː ɖɨɑ̀ŋ tʷɑ́n mʉòː děŋ .
c6-s93.tupa: liet tjy dryang twanq muo dengh

c6-s94.ipa: ɦʷək lèw lèw ɲǐː sɑ̀m mʉt .
c6-s94.tupa: ghweok lew lew njih sam mut

c6-s95.ipa: nə́j ʨǐː ʥiàŋ ʦʰèn ʥɨɑ̌ŋ mʉǒn .
c6-s95.tupa: neojq tjih djiaeng tshen djyangh muonh

c6-s96.ipa: ɲièn jiak mʉòː sʉòː lěŋ kɨ̌ː .
c6-s96.tupa: njien jiaek muo suo lengh kyh

c6-s97.ipa: ʥɨ̀ː kʰɑ́ː jɨ́ː ʨɨ̀ː ɖɨɑ̀ŋ kʉǒː tək ʨɨ̀ː jiáː .
c6-s97.tupa: djy khaq jyq tjy dryang kuoh teok tjy jiaeq

c6-s99.source: 以循環次第觀一列之物。
c6-s99.ipa: jɨ́ː zʷìn ɦʷạ̀n ʦʰǐː děj kʷɑ̀n ʔit liet ʨɨ̀ː mʉt .
c6-s99.tupa: jyq zwin ghwaen tshih dejh kwan qit liet tjy mut

c6-s106.ipa: ɲɨɑk ʔịt dɑ̌j ʔɨə̀ː kạp ʨɨ̀ː ɖɨɑ̀ŋ ʨiáː .
c6-s106.tupa: njyak qyit dajh qyo kaep tjy dryang tjiaeq

c6-s114.ipa: liet kɨ̌j nə̀ŋ ʦə̀ŋ ɲɨ̀ː ʈɨɑ́ŋ ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s114.tupa: liet kyjh neong tseong njy tryangq tjy

c6-s115.ipa: jiak kʰɑ́ː pʉ̀n jɨ́ː tʷɑ́n ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s115.tupa: jiaek khaq pun jyq twanq tjy

c6-s117.ipa: kʰǐː gɨ̀ː děj ʔit ɲɨ̀ː lʉùː gɨ̀ː tʰɑ̀ː jiáː .
c6-s117.tupa: khih gy dejh qit njy lu gy tha jiaeq

c6-s120.ipa: ʂɨ́ː kạp ɦʉúː ʔit ɲǐː sɑ̀m ʨiáː .
c6-s120.tupa: sryq kaep uq qit njih sam tjiaeq

c6-s122.ipa: ʂɨ́ː kạp ɦʉúː ɲǐː sǐː lʉuk pẹt ʨiáː .
c6-s122.tupa: sryq kaep uq njih sih luk peet tjiaeq

c6-s123.ipa: ʔịt nə́j ɦʉúː sǐː lʉuk pẹt .
c6-s123.tupa: qyit neojq uq sih luk peet

c6-s128.ipa: ɦʷək bʉǔː ʨʰʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː jɨ́ː ɦạ̀w .
c6-s128.tupa: ghweok buh tjhung tjy jyq ghaew

c6-s135.ipa: ʣǐː ʥiéː pʉùː tək ɦón ɦạ̀w ɲɨ́ː .
c6-s135.tupa: dzih djieq pu teok ghonq ghaew njyq

c6-s136.ipa: ɦʉǔː liet ɦʉúː jɨ̌ː miàŋ ʨiáː .
c6-s136.tupa: uh liet uq jyh miaeng tjiaeq

c6-s148.ipa: siak ʨɨ̀ː ʔịt ʨɨ̀ː ʔit ʨiáː .
c6-s148.tupa: siaek tjy qyit tjy qit tjiaeq

c6-s155.ipa: jʷìː jiak ʔịt ɲɨ̀ː ʔɨɑ̀ŋ gịp kạp .
c6-s155.tupa: jwi jiaek qyit njy qyang gyip kaep

c6-s161.ipa: miàŋ sʷìː ɲǐː ʦək ʑit ʔit jiáː .
c6-s161.tupa: miaeng swi njih tseok zjit qit jiaeq

c6-s163.ipa: jʉok liàŋ gɨ̀ː ʑit jiak ɲǐː .
c6-s163.tupa: juok liaeng gy zjit jiaek njih

c6-s172.ipa: hɑ̌n ʈɨɑ̀ŋ ɦạ̀ŋ ʣɨ̌ː bịàŋ ʦɨ́ː .
c6-s172.tupa: hanh tryang ghaeng dzyh byaeng tsyq

c6-s175.ipa: gɨ̀ː ɕɨ̀ː pʉùŋ lʉùː ʔʉón ʈyén .
c6-s175.tupa: gy sjy pung lu quonq trwienq

c6-s176.ipa: ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ʥɨ̀ŋ kʉt ʦɨ́ː ʨɨ̀ː jʷìː ŋịěː .
c6-s176.tupa: djyangh djyng kut tsyq tjy jwi ngyeh

c6-s177.ipa: ɦạ́ː kʰéj ʦʰit ŋɨə̀n ʨɨ̀ː lɑ̌m ɕɨɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s177.tupa: ghaeq khejq tshit ngyon tjy lamh sjyang

c6-s178.ipa: kị̀m kạ́ː gɨ̀ː ɕɨ̀ː jɨ́ː ʑǐː liet ʨɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ .
c6-s178.tupa: kyim kaeq gy sjy jyq zjih liet tjy juongh

c6-s181.source: 若「我所思兮在」云云皆同。
c6-s181.ipa: ɲɨɑk ŋɑ́ː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ɦèj ʣə́j ɦʉ̀n ɦʉ̀n kẹ̀j dùŋ .
c6-s181.tupa: njyak ngaq sryoq sy ghej dzeojq un un keej doung

c6-s183.ipa: kị̀m ʦʰɑk tɑ̀w gị̀m lɑ̀ŋ kɑ̀n ʨɨə̀ː zɨ̀ː kǒː jɨ̌ː .
c6-s183.tupa: kyim tshak taw gyim lang kan tjyo zy koh jyh

c6-s184.source: 故先入其變辭於列中待用也。
c6-s184.ipa: kǒː sèn ɲip gɨ̀ː pịěn zɨ̀ː ʔɨə̀ː liet ʈʉùŋ də́j jʉǒŋ jiáː .
c6-s184.tupa: koh sen njip gy pyenh zy qyo liet trung deojq juongh jiaeq

c6-s194.source: 充「其所」以『太山』以『桂林』以『漢陽』以『雁門』。
c6-s194.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ gɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː tʰɑ̌j ʂẹ̀n jɨ́ː kʷěj lìm jɨ́ː hɑ̌n jɨɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː ŋạ̌n mòn .
c6-s194.tupa: tjhung gy sryoq jyq thajh sreen jyq kwejh lim jyq hanh jyang jyq ngaenh mon

c6-s195.source: 充「所難」以『樑父艱』以『湘水深』以『隴阪長』以『雪雰雰』。
c6-s195.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː nɑ̀n jɨ́ː lɨɑ̀ŋ bʉóː kẹ̀n jɨ́ː sɨɑ̀ŋ ɕʷíː ɕìm jɨ́ː lʉóŋ pʉón ɖɨɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː syet pʰʉ̀n pʰʉ̀n .
c6-s195.tupa: tjhung sryoq nan jyq lyang buoq keen jyq syang sjwiq sjim jyq luongq puonq dryang jyq swiet phun phun

c6-s196.source: 充「其方」以『東』以『南』以『西』以『北』。
c6-s196.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ gɨ̀ː pʉɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː tùŋ jɨ́ː nə̀m jɨ́ː sèj jɨ́ː pək .
c6-s196.tupa: tjhung gy puang jyq toung jyq neom jyq sej jyq peok

c6-s197.source: 充「所沾」以『翰』以『襟』以『裳』以『巾』。
c6-s197.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː tʰèm jɨ́ː ɦɑ̌n jɨ́ː kị̀m jɨ́ː ʥɨɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː kị̀n .
c6-s197.tupa: tjhung sryoq them jyq ghanh jyq kyim jyq djyang jyq kyin

c6-s198.source: 充「所贈」以『金錯刀』以『琴琅玕』以『貂襜褕』以『錦繡段』。
c6-s198.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː ʣə̌ŋ jɨ́ː kị̀m ʦʰɑk tɑ̀w jɨ́ː gị̀m lɑ̀ŋ kɑ̀n jɨ́ː tèw ʨʰièm jʉòː jɨ́ː kị́m sʉǔː dʷɑ̌n .
c6-s198.tupa: tjhung sryoq dzeongh jyq kyim tshak taw jyq gyim lang kan jyq tew tjhiem juo jyq kyimq suh dwanh

c6-s199.source: 充「所報」以『英瓊瑤』以『雙玉盤』以『明月珠』以『青玉案』。
c6-s199.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː pɑ̌w jɨ́ː ʔịàŋ gyàŋ jièw jɨ́ː ʂọ̀ŋ ŋʉok bɑ̀n jɨ́ː mịàŋ ŋʉot ʨʉòː jɨ́ː ʦʰèŋ ŋʉok ʔɑ̌n .
c6-s199.tupa: tjhung sryoq pawh jyq qyaeng gwiaeng jiew jyq sroeung nguok ban jyq myaeng nguot tjuo jyq tsheng nguok qanh

c6-s200.source: 充「所感」以『逍遙』以『惆悵』以『踟躕』以『增嘆』。
c6-s200.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː kə́m jɨ́ː sièw jièw jɨ́ː ʈʰʉùː ʈʰɨɑ̌ŋ jɨ́ː ɖièː ɖʉòː jɨ́ː ʦə̀ŋ tʰɑ̌n .
c6-s200.tupa: tjhung sryoq keomq jyq siew jiew jyq ʈʰu ʈʰyangh jyq drie druo jyq tseong thanh

c6-s201.source: 充「所傷」以『勞』以『傷』以『紆』以『惋』。
c6-s201.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː ɕɨɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː lɑ̀w jɨ́ː ɕɨɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː ʔʉòː jɨ́ː ʔʷɑ̌n .
c6-s201.tupa: tjhung sryoq sjyang jyq law jyq sjyang jyq quo jyq qwanh

c6-s203.ipa: ʦʰiáŋ sèn jɨ́ː ʔit kʷɑ̀n ʨɨə̀ː liet .
c6-s203.tupa: tshiaengq sen jyq qit kwan tjyo liet

c6-s204.ipa: bʉòm liet ʈʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː ŋʉòn ʨiáː .
c6-s204.tupa: buom liet trung tjy nguon tjiaeq

c6-s206.ipa: ʥiéː kʉǒː kěn ʔɨə̀ː ʣèn ʨɨɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s206.tupa: djieq kuoh kenh qyo dzen tjyang

c6-s210.ipa: bʉòm gɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː ʈʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː dǐː .
c6-s210.tupa: buom gy sryoq trung tjy dih

c6-s215.ipa: ɦʉot ʦʰiéː kẹ̀j ɦʉúː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ʨɨ̀ː dǐː jiáː .
c6-s215.tupa: uot tshieq keej uq sryoq sy tjy dih jiaeq

c6-s217.ipa: bʉòm ʂɨə́ː ʣə̌ŋ ʈʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː pɑ́w .
c6-s217.tupa: buom sryoq dzeongh trung tjy pawq

c6-s222.ipa: ɦʉot ʦʰiéː kẹ̀j mị́ː ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː ʣə̌ŋ jiáː .
c6-s222.tupa: uot tshieq keej myiq njin tjy sryoq dzeongh jiaeq

c6-s224.ipa: nə́j jɨ́ː ʦɑ́ː ɕɨə̀ː ʈɨɑ̀ŋ ʦɨ́ː ʨɨ̀ː ɕɨ̀ː .
c6-s224.tupa: neojq jyq tsaq sjyo tryang tsyq tjy sjy

c6-s227.ipa: ɦʷək ʦʰʉóː pịěn zɨ̀ː ʔɨə̀ː ʨɨə̀ː liet .
c6-s227.tupa: ghweok tshuoq pyenh zy qyo tjyo liet

c6-s228.ipa: ʨʉùŋ ʔit ʨɨɑ̀ŋ ʔit piǎŋ ɕɨə̀ː ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s228.tupa: tjung qit tjyang qit piaengh sjyo tjy

c6-s234.ipa: ɦʉot ŋɑ́ː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ɦèj ʣə́j .
c6-s234.tupa: uot ngaq sryoq sy ghej dzeojq

c6-s252.ipa: ɦʉot . lǒː ɦʉón mɑk ʈǐː ʔịéː .
c6-s252.tupa: uot loh uonq mak trih qyeq

c6-s255.ipa: ɦʉot . ɦɑ̀ː ɦỵèː ɦʷẹ̀j ʔʉùː sìm bʉòn .
c6-s255.tupa: uot gha ue ghweej qu sim buon

c6-s262.ipa: nə́j tək ŋʉòn ɕɨ̀ː ɲɨə̀ː ʥiéː .
c6-s262.tupa: neojq teok nguon sjy njyo djieq

c6-s263.ipa: ŋɑ́ː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ɦèj ʣə́j tʰɑ̌j ʂẹ̀n .
c6-s263.tupa: ngaq sryoq sy ghej dzeojq thajh sreen

c6-s264.ipa: jʉok ɦʉɑ́ŋ ʣʉòŋ ʨɨ̀ː lɨɑ̀ŋ bʉóː kẹ̀n .
c6-s264.tupa: juok uangq dzuong tjy lyang buoq keen

c6-s265.ipa: ꭧɨk ɕìn tùŋ mʉɑ̌ŋ tʰěj tʰèm ɦɑ̌n .
c6-s265.tupa: tsryk sjin toung muangh thejh them ghanh

c6-s266.ipa: mị́ː ɲìn ʣə̌ŋ ŋɑ́ː kị̀m ʦʰɑk tɑ̀w .
c6-s266.tupa: myiq njin dzeongh ngaq kyim tshak taw

c6-s267.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː jɨ́ː pɑ̌w ʨɨ̀ː ʔịàŋ gyàŋ jièw .
c6-s267.tupa: gha jyq pawh tjy qyaeng gwiaeng jiew

c6-s268.ipa: lǒː ɦʉón mɑk ʈǐː ʔịéː sièw jièw .
c6-s268.tupa: loh uonq mak trih qyeq siew jiew

c6-s269.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː ɦỵèː ɦʷẹ̀j ʔʉùː sìm bʉòn lɑ̀w .
c6-s269.tupa: gha ue ghweej qu sim buon law .

c6-s270.ipa: ŋɑ́ː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ɦèj ʣə́j kʷěj lìm .
c6-s270.tupa: ngaq sryoq sy ghej dzeojq kwejh lim

c6-s271.ipa: jʉok ɦʉɑ́ŋ ʣʉòŋ ʨɨ̀ː sɨɑ̀ŋ ɕʷíː ɕìm .
c6-s271.tupa: juok uangq dzuong tjy syang sjwiq sjim

c6-s272.ipa: ꭧɨk ɕìn nə̀m mʉɑ̌ŋ tʰěj tʰèm kị̀m .
c6-s272.tupa: tsryk sjin neom muangh thejh them kyim

c6-s273.ipa: mị́ː ɲìn ʣə̌ŋ ŋɑ́ː gị̀m lɑ̀ŋ kɑ̀n .
c6-s273.tupa: myiq njin dzeongh ngaq gyim lang kan

c6-s274.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː jɨ́ː pɑ̌w ʨɨ̀ː ʂọ̀ŋ ŋʉok bɑ̀n .
c6-s274.tupa: gha jyq pawh tjy sroeung nguok ban

c6-s275.ipa: lǒː ɦʉón mɑk ʈǐː ʔịéː ʈʰʉùː ʈʰɨɑ̌ŋ .
c6-s275.tupa: loh uonq mak trih qyeq ʈʰu ʈʰyangh

c6-s276.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː ɦỵèː ɦʷẹ̀j ʔʉùː sìm bʉòn ɕɨɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s276.tupa: gha ue ghweej qu sim buon sjyang .

c6-s277.ipa: ŋɑ́ː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ɦèj ʣə́j hɑ̌n jɨɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s277.tupa: ngaq sryoq sy ghej dzeojq hanh jyang

c6-s278.ipa: jʉok ɦʉɑ́ŋ ʣʉòŋ ʨɨ̀ː lʉóŋ pʉón ɖɨɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s278.tupa: juok uangq dzuong tjy luongq puonq dryang

c6-s279.ipa: ꭧɨk ɕìn sèj mʉɑ̌ŋ tʰěj tʰèm ʥɨɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s279.tupa: tsryk sjin sej muangh thejh them djyang

c6-s280.ipa: mị́ː ɲìn ʣə̌ŋ ŋɑ́ː tèw ʨʰièm jʉòː .
c6-s280.tupa: myiq njin dzeongh ngaq tew tjhiem juo

c6-s281.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː jɨ́ː pɑ̌w ʨɨ̀ː mịàŋ ŋʉot ʨʉòː .
c6-s281.tupa: gha jyq pawh tjy myaeng nguot tjuo

c6-s282.ipa: lǒː ɦʉón mɑk ʈǐː ʔịéː ɖièː ɖʉòː .
c6-s282.tupa: loh uonq mak trih qyeq drie druo

c6-s283.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː ɦỵèː ɦʷẹ̀j ʔʉùː sìm bʉòn ʔʉòː .
c6-s283.tupa: gha ue ghweej qu sim buon quo .

c6-s284.ipa: ŋɑ́ː ʂɨə́ː sɨ̀ː ɦèj ʣə́j ŋạ̌n mòn .
c6-s284.tupa: ngaq sryoq sy ghej dzeojq ngaenh mon

c6-s285.ipa: jʉok ɦʉɑ́ŋ ʣʉòŋ ʨɨ̀ː syet pʰʉ̀n pʰʉ̀n .
c6-s285.tupa: juok uangq dzuong tjy swiet phun phun

c6-s286.ipa: ꭧɨk ɕìn pək mʉɑ̌ŋ tʰěj tʰèm kị̀n .
c6-s286.tupa: tsryk sjin peok muangh thejh them kyin

c6-s287.ipa: mị́ː ɲìn ʣə̌ŋ ŋɑ́ː kị́m sʉǔː dʷɑ̌n .
c6-s287.tupa: myiq njin dzeongh ngaq kyimq suh dwanh

c6-s288.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː jɨ́ː pɑ̌w ʨɨ̀ː ʦʰèŋ ŋʉok ʔɑ̌n .
c6-s288.tupa: gha jyq pawh tjy tsheng nguok qanh

c6-s289.ipa: lǒː ɦʉón mɑk ʈǐː ʔịéː ʦə̀ŋ tʰɑ̌n .
c6-s289.tupa: loh uonq mak trih qyeq tseong thanh

c6-s290.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː ɦỵèː ɦʷẹ̀j ʔʉùː sìm bʉòn ʔʷɑ̌n
c6-s290.tupa: gha ue ghweej qu sim buon qwanh

c6-s291.ipa: gɨ̀ː ɕɨ̀ː ʦǐn ɲìn pʉǒː ɦʷèn .
c6-s291.tupa: gy sjy tsinh njin puoh ghwen

c6-s293.ipa: gɨ́n ɲìn lóː sǐn kẹ̀j ʥɨɑ̀ŋ ɦỵèː ŋɨ́ː ʦɑk .
c6-s293.tupa: gynq njin loq sinh keej djyang ue ngyq tsak

c6-s294.ipa: ʦʰiáŋ ŋòː ʦɨ́ː ɖạk kɨ́ː ʂɨə́ː hɑ̌w .
c6-s294.tupa: tshiaengq ngo tsyq draek kyq sryoq hawh

c6-s295.source: 試易前文諸列以得其詩。
c6-s295.ipa: ɕɨ̌ː jiak ʣèn mʉ̀n ʨɨə̀ː liet jɨ́ː tək gɨ̀ː ɕɨ̀ː .
c6-s295.tupa: sjyh jiaek dzen mun tjyo liet jyq teok gy sjy

c6-s298.ipa: ʦʉǒŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ ɲɨə̀ː pʉɑ̀ŋ ɖǐn ɲièn .
c6-s298.tupa: tsuongh ghwaeng njyo puang drinh njien

c6-s302.ipa: tʰèn jɨə́ː ɦʉóː lɑk ʨʰʷit ɕɨə̀ː .
c6-s302.tupa: then jyoq uoq lak tjhwit sjyo

c6-s303.ipa: ʑìn kʷị̀ː bʉúː mʉ̀n ɲɨ̀ː ʨʰʷit .
c6-s303.tupa: zjin kwyi buq mun njy tjhwit

c6-s306.ipa: ɦʉóː zʷǐː ʔìn ɲɨ̀ː děj ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s306.tupa: uoq zwih qin njy dejh tjy

c6-s308.ipa: ʨʉòː hɨ̀ː jɨ́ː ʨɨ̀ː ɦỵèː kʉúː kʉùŋ ʂʉǒː .
c6-s308.tupa: tjuo hy jyq tjy ue kuq kung sruoh

c6-s309.ipa: gịèː ʨiáː ɦəp ʦʉǒŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ ziàː kẹ̀j ʥip ŋóː .
c6-s309.tupa: gye tjiaeq gheop tsuongh ghwaeng ziae keej djip ngoq

c6-s310.source: 其術見於楊輝續古摘奇算法。
c6-s310.ipa: gɨ̀ː ʑʷit kěn ʔɨə̀ː jɨɑ̀ŋ hʉ̀j zʉok kóː ʈẹk gịèː sʷɑ̌n pʉop .
c6-s310.tupa: gy zjwit kenh qyo jyang huj zuok koq treek gye swanh puop

c6-s320.source: 今入九宮數於列列如下。
c6-s320.ipa: kị̀m ɲip kʉúː kʉùŋ ʂʉǒː ʔɨə̀ː liet liet ɲɨə̀ː ɦạ́ː .
c6-s320.tupa: kyim njip kuq kung sruoh qyo liet liet njyo ghaeq

c6-s338.source: 充「九宮」以「行一」以「行二」以「行三」。
c6-s338.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ kʉúː kʉùŋ jɨ́ː ɦɑ̀ŋ ʔit jɨ́ː ɦɑ̀ŋ ɲǐː jɨ́ː ɦɑ̀ŋ sɑ̀m .
c6-s338.tupa: tjhung kuq kung jyq ghang qit jyq ghang njih jyq ghang sam

c6-s339.ipa: bʉòm kʉúː kʉùŋ ʈʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s339.tupa: buom kuq kung trung tjy ghang

c6-s342.ipa: ɲièn ʥiéː dɑ́n liet gɨ̀ː ʂʉǒː .
c6-s342.tupa: njien djieq danq liet gy sruoh

c6-s343.ipa: mʉ̌j ʥɨɑ̀ŋ jɨ́ː ʑʷit sʷɑ̌n ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s343.tupa: mujh djyang jyq zjwit swanh tjy

c6-s349.ipa: bʉòm gɨ̀ː ɦʷạ̀ŋ ʦʉòŋ ɦỵèː jɨɑ̀ŋ ʂʉǒː ʨiáː .
c6-s349.tupa: buom gy ghwaeng tsuong ue jyang sruoh tjiaeq

c6-s351.ipa: ɲièn jɨɑ̀ŋ ʥiéː kǒː pʉùː ʣǐː ʈièː .
c6-s351.tupa: njien jyang djieq koh pu dzih trie

c6-s352.ipa: jʉùː jɨ́ː tʰɑ̀ː pʉop ɦỵèː ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s352.tupa: ju jyq tha puop ue tjy

c6-s353.ipa: kị̀m ʣʉòŋ gɨ̀ː lɑk ɕɨə̀ː kẹ́n pʉop .
c6-s353.tupa: kyim dzuong gy lak sjyo keenq puop

c6-s367.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ dòː .
c6-s367.tupa: miaeng tjy uot tsuong ghwaeng do

c6-s373.ipa: ʨʰʉùŋ ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ dòː jɨ́ː ɦɑ̀ŋ jiáː .
c6-s373.tupa: tjhung tsuong ghwaeng do jyq ghang jiaeq

c6-s375.source: 乃以楊氏之術遍算其數。
c6-s375.ipa: nə́j jɨ́ː jɨɑ̀ŋ ʥiéː ʨɨ̀ː ʑʷit pěn sʷɑ̌n gɨ̀ː ʂʉǒː .
c6-s375.tupa: neojq jyq jyang djieq tjy zjwit penh swanh gy sruoh

c6-s379.ipa: ʣǐː ʦɑ́ː ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɲɨ̀ː ɦʉúː ɦạ́ː .
c6-s379.tupa: dzih tsaq djyangh njy uq ghaeq

c6-s382.ipa: ʣǐː ɦʉúː ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɲɨ̀ː ʦɑ́ː ɦạ́ː .
c6-s382.tupa: dzih uq djyangh njy tsaq ghaeq

c6-s385.source: 所以定九子斜排之方位也。
c6-s385.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː děŋ kʉúː ʦɨ́ː ziàː bẹ̀j ʨɨ̀ː pʉɑ̀ŋ ɦʷị̌ː jiáː .
c6-s385.tupa: sryoq jyq dengh kuq tsyq ziae beej tjy puang ghwyih jiaeq

c6-s391.source: 所以化斜排之方位於正排之方位也。
c6-s391.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː hʷạ̌ː ziàː bẹ̀j ʨɨ̀ː pʉɑ̀ŋ ɦʷị̌ː ʔɨə̀ː ʨiǎŋ bẹ̀j ʨɨ̀ː pʉɑ̀ŋ ɦʷị̌ː jiáː .
c6-s391.tupa: sryoq jyq hwaeh ziae beej tjy puang ghwyih qyo tjiaengh beej tjy puang ghwyih jiaeq

c6-s393.ipa: ɦʷək ʨʰʷit ʔɨə̀ː gɨ̀ː dòː ʨɨ̀ː kẹ̌j .
c6-s393.tupa: ghweok tjhwit qyo gy do tjy keejh

c6-s399.ipa: ʥiéː ʂɨə́ː ɦʉ̌j ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɦạ́ː tǒj jiak .
c6-s399.tupa: djieq sryoq ujh djyangh ghaeq tojh jiaek

c6-s400.ipa: ʦɑ́ː ɦʉúː sɨɑ̀ŋ kạ̌ŋ ʨiáː jiáː .
c6-s400.tupa: tsaq uq syang kaengh tjiaeq jiaeq

c6-s435.ipa: bʉòː ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ dòː ʨɨ̀ː ʦʉòŋ .
c6-s435.tupa: buo tsuong ghwaeng do tjy tsuong

c6-s437.ipa: siak ʨɨ̀ː ɦɑ̀ŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʷạ̀ŋ ʨiáː .
c6-s437.tupa: siaek tjy ghang tjy ghwaeng tjiaeq

c6-s443.ipa: bʉòm ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ dòː ʈʉùŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦɑ̀ŋ .
c6-s443.tupa: buom tsuong ghwaeng do trung tjy ghang

c6-s446.ipa: nə́j tək kʉúː kʉúː dòː ɲɨə̀ː ʥiéː .
c6-s446.tupa: neojq teok kuq kuq do njyo djieq

c6-s447.source: 其與楊氏書中所載不同者。
c6-s447.ipa: gɨ̀ː jɨə́ː jɨɑ̀ŋ ʥiéː ɕɨə̀ː ʈʉùŋ ʂɨə́ː ʣə̌j pʉùː dùŋ ʨiáː .
c6-s447.tupa: gy jyoq jyang djieq sjyo trung sryoq dzeojh pu doung tjiaeq

c6-s448.ipa: kɑ̌j ʦɑk gɨ̀ː dòː ʨɨ̀ː pʉop ʥím ʨʉǔŋ .
c6-s448.tupa: kajh tsak gy do tjy puop djimq tjungh

c6-s449.ipa: ʂɨə́ː tək jiak kɑk ɦʉúː jɨ̌ː .
c6-s449.tupa: sryoq teok jiaek kak uq jyh

c6-s450.source: 然其之為縱橫圖者一也。
c6-s450.ipa: ɲièn gɨ̀ː ʨɨ̀ː ɦỵèː ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ dòː ʨiáː ʔit jiáː .
c6-s450.tupa: njien gy tjy ue tsuong ghwaeng do tjiaeq qit jiaeq

c6-s452.source: 縱橫斜皆三百六十九也。
c6-s452.ipa: ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ ziàː kẹ̀j sɑ̀m pạk lʉuk ʥip kʉúː jiáː .
c6-s452.tupa: tsuong ghwaeng ziae keej sam paek luk djip kuq jiaeq

c6-s456.ipa: ʦʰiáŋ ŋòː ʦɨ́ː ɕɨ̌ː ʦɑk ʔit ʑʷit .
c6-s456.tupa: tshiaengq ngo tsyq sjyh tsak qit zjwit

c6-s457.ipa: zʷìn ɦʷạ̀n pěn lek gɨ̀ː dòː .
c6-s457.tupa: zwin ghwaen penh lek gy do

c6-s458.ipa: jɨ́ː ŋịěm ŋòː ŋɨə̀n ʨɨ̀ː pʉùː mị̌w jiáː .
c6-s458.tupa: jyq ngyemh ngo ngyon tjy pu myiwh jiaeq

c6-s540.source: 又有傳暹羅法作陽數縱橫圖。
c6-s540.ipa: ɦʉǔː ɦʉúː ɖyèn sièm lɑ̀ː pʉop ʦɑk jɨɑ̀ŋ ʂʉǒː ʦʉòŋ ɦʷạ̀ŋ dòː .
c6-s540.tupa: uh uq drwien siem la puop tsak jyang sruoh tsuong ghwaeng do

c6-s543.ipa: tùŋ pək hɨɑ̌ŋ ʦʰǐː děj dèn ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s543.tupa: toung peok hyangh tshih dejh den tjy

c6-s547.ipa: sèn nə̀m tʰǒj ɲɨ̀ː ɦúː ʦǐn .
c6-s547.tupa: sen neom thojh njy ghouq tsinh

c6-s548.ipa: gɨ̀ː kạ̌w jɨɑ̀ŋ hʉ̀j pʉop jʉùː ʂạ̌w jiěː jiáː .
c6-s548.tupa: gy kaewh jyang huj puop ju sraewh jieh jiaeq

c6-s549.ipa: kʉ̀n ɦòː pʉùː ʔit ɕɨ̌ː ʨɨ̀ː .
c6-s549.tupa: kun gho pu qit sjyh tjy
